name: Viking Rampage
description:
(Made for "DM i spiludvikling 2017", started project 9. June 2017)

Viking Rampage is an action-based medieval shooter.

You are playing as sven. Sven's family got killed by a bunch of bandits, so Sven build a tank to deal with them.
Sven is now driving his tank around killing every bandit he sees on his rampage.
